subject: RF amp from AM
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Trying to get improvement for weak signal areas. I added a simple single
stage FET antenna amplifier to the AM rod antenna by adding and extra loop
on the end of the rod. It's specially designed to reject all MP3 signals at
the antenna :-0

 F-S
